Subjects: God, prayers to; fragments; prayers, of sinners; prayers, to God
_description: A prayer to God as creator and guardian of all to help the sinful petitioner — fragments of twelve lines, possibly couplets

BodEngMisC674.Note:
Fragment of paper page, written in hand of the fifteenth century, found
                    in June 1977 in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Ashmole 1518 between ff. 77 and 78; set out as verse
                    with upper case letters at beginnings of each line.
